name: space shooter (beer119)
description:
An astroid shoot game made in Godot 3.0.

Licens: MIT

The original graphic can be found here:
https://github.com/vnen/Godot-24-Hours 

And the code is inspired by chapter 5 in this book;
https://play.google.com/store/books/details/Ariel_Manzur_Godot_Engine_Game_Development_in_24_H?id=3gBRDwAAQBAJ&hl=en_US
